description: Replacement of all non-original windows with painted timber sash windows, non-original french doors at lower ground and ground floor level with single glazed painted timber doors; lowering of sill of 1no. rear lower ground floor window to create door; replacement of timber boarded gates to side passage with traditional metal gates; refinishing of concrete front entrance steps with york stone; removal of security grilles from front, lower ground floor sash window; removal of alarm, flue, and canopy from front faâ€¡ade; replacement of rear balcony and moving of rear balcony steps and new rails;  replacement extract routes to be terminated by cast iron air bricks; all external metalwork to be black, painted and traditionally detailed; removal of timber balustrade to rear lightwells and installation of traditional black painted metalbalustrades; removal of overlaid stone to rear and reinstatement of lower patio level with york stone; associated internal refurbishment and alterations to a listed building; provision of a small conservatory-like rear addition at lower ground level below proposed balcony.***WITHDRAWN***
